subject: RE: [junit] Re: How to test private methods in a class.
msgSnippet: ... I use access protection in Java, just not for marking API as published. It doesn t fill like working against the language at all. Cheers, ILja
messageBody:
> Access
> protection is a fairly fundamental part of Java. You'll have more
> success working with the language than against it.

I use access protection in Java, just not for marking API as published. It
doesn't fill like working against the language at all.

Cheers, ILja
